tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SquadList (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    team_id INT,
    position VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES TeamRoster(team_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Player (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    player_position VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    player_age INT NOT NULL,
    team_id INT REFERENCES TeamRoster(team_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_list (
    player_id INT NOT NULL,
    player_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    age INT NOT NULL,
    position VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    team_id INT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES team_rosters (team_id)
);

CREATE TABLE match_schedule (
    match_id INT NOT NULL,
    match_date DATE NOT NULL,
    match_time TIME NOT NULL,
    venue VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (match_id)
);

CREATE TABLE match_participation (
    match_id INT NOT NULL,
    player_id INT NOT NULL,
    goals_scored INT NOT NULL,
    assists INT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (match_id, player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (match_id) REFERENCES match_schedule (match_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_list (player_id)
);
